text: pas agar ye log bhee usee tarah eemaan lae hain jis tarah tum to alabatta raahe raast par aa gae aur agar vah is tareeke se munh pher len to bas vah sirph tumhaaree hee zid par hai to (ai rasool) un (ke shar) se (bachaane ko) tumhaare lie khuda kaafee hoga aur vah (sabakee haalat) khoob jaanata (aur) sunata hai
